txt.en: Alla has given you five minutes to reach the spot in question along the road in view of Tharbad.

'Welcome back! I am less surprised this time, for you have proven quite capable of finishing these dares! Now I know this one is also possible, and when I do it I will have less to fear, even though the grown-ups always say getting so near to Tharbad is dangerous.

'So, what did you see when you got to that location? Anything notable?'

You tell her that there was a shovel standing in the dirt, but its owner was nowhere to be seen.

'Very interesting, all right. Thank you once again! That is the last of the Mossward bully's dares, so I won't be needing your help anymore. But you have been most helpful, and I appreciate it!'
Alla is by a haystack in north-eastern Mossward. You only have five minutes for the return journey!
Alla is by a haystack in north-eastern Mossward.
This is the spot Alla described. How odd: a shovel stands abandoned in the dirt here
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not run out of time before reaching the correct location</rgb>
Return to Alla in north-eastern Mossward without running out of time
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not run out of time before reaching the correct location</rgb>
Talk to Alla in north-eastern Mossward
Alla has been issued a second dare by the Mossward bully, and she needs your help once again.

'I really appreciate your help with that, [placeholder]. When I go to complete that dare, now I know how to do it, and that it's possible, and that's going to make a big difference.

'But you are not going to believe this. The bully has issued a SECOND dare! He must know I am well-prepared to finish the first one, so he's already made up this second one. Will you help me with this one too? I simply must know if this is possible.

'The same rules are at play this time as there were for the first time: five minutes out there, and five minutes back. I'll mark the spot on your map, as I did before. This time you're going within view of the flooded city of Tharbad!'
'Remember, you only have five minutes to reach the spot I marked on your map! Hurry, hurry, hurry!'
Make it to the marked spot along the road to Tharbad without running out of time
